The buttons will change to arrow buttons, pointing up.7.", "OB": "When changing the styles of the ControlExample Button Tab, the button orientation is reset to the default orientation.", "EB": "To reproduce the issue, select or deselect SWT.BORDER in the styles group of the ControlExample Button Tab.", "SR": "The ControlExample Button Tab should retain the button orientation when changing styles."}

origin.input_prompt:

In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
